content:
path /stack/v1/stacks/stackid
operationId DeleteStack
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name notbefore
description The date and time after which a stack should be deleted

If a notbefore date is not provided then the stack will be marked for deletion one day after the time of the request Provide a notbefore date on or before the current date/time to mark the stack for immediate deletion
in query
required False
schema
type string
format datetime
summary Set a stacks deletion date
description Set a stacks deleteafter value The stack scheduled for deletion after its deleteafter date is reached

Deleting a stack deletes all services on the stack cannot be stopped after it has started and is an unrecoverable operation Services on the stack accrue billable charges until deletion has finished
responses
200
stackDeleteStackResponse
type object
stackStack
type object
properties
id
type string
description A stacks unique identifier
accountId
type string
description The ID of the account that a stack belongs to
slug
type string
description A stacks humanfriendly identifier

This can be used in place of a stacks ID in most situations to identify a stack It can be no longer than 30 characters each being a lowercase letter number or dash It also cannot start with a dash end with a dash or have consecutive dashes This value can be provided on creation or is derived from the stacks name if a slug isnt provided This value cannot be updated once its created
name
type string
description A stacks name

Stack names cannot be empty cannot be over 255 characters long and must be unique per account
createdAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a stack was created
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a stack was last updated
deleteAfter
type string
format datetime
description The date that a stack will be processed for deletion

Deletion is processed on or after this time Stack deletion removes all services on the stack and cannot be halted once begun
stackStackStatus
type string
default PENDING
description A stacks status

  PENDING The stack is being created
  ACTIVE The stack is active and all active services on the stack are accessible
  DISABLED The stack and its services were disabled by the user
  SUSPENDED The stack and its services were suspended and are inaccessible
  BILLINGSUSPENDED The stack and its services were suspended by StackPath for billing reasons and are inaccessible
  DELETED The stack and its services have been deleted and inaccessible
  DELETEREQUESTED The stack has passed its deleteafter date and will be deleted
  DELETEPROCESSING Stack deletion has begun and cannot be interrupted
  SUSPENDREQUESTED Stack suspension has been requested
  SUSPENDPROCESSING Stack suspension has started and services are being suspended
  UNSUSPENDREQUESTED Stack unsuspension has been requested
  UNSUSPENDPROCESSING Stack unsuspension has begin and services are being reactivated
description A stack
description A response from a request to delete a stack
